Mouna Fettou (Arabic; a mụrụ n'abalị 28 nke ọnwa Nọvemba, afọ 1970) bụ onye Morocco na-eme ihe nkiri nke gosipụtara n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri, egwuregwu, na ihe ngosi TV. Ụfọdụ n'ime ọrụ ya a ma ama bụ na fim À la recherche du mari de ma femme [fr] (1995), na Women..
Ọ lụrụ Saad ash-Shraibi, onye mepụtara ọtụtụ ihe nkiri ya. Ọ na-akwado ihe ngosi TV Jari Ya Jari na Media 1.
A na-asọpụrụ ya na nkwanye ùgwù pụrụ iche na 2019 Marrakech International Film Festival maka afọ 30 ya nke ime ihe nkiri.
